page.title: 19FARMING (2)
page.content:
One of the main activities still on the farm is{dairying.}There are 34 dairy cows of the{Shorthorn }variety. These are milked twice a day. The milk being collected by a road tanker and taken to the creamery at St Erth.
Another important activity is the growing of crops. The crops include{dredge corn, potatoes, cabbage {and swedes.}Dredge corn is a traditional Cornish crop which is a mixture of {barley}and {oats.}It is used as a fodder crop.The potatoes, cabbage and swedes are sold locally or used to feed the cattle. A number of beef cattle are also kept.There are 35 pigs on the farm, 3 sows and 32 piglets.Chickens are kept for their eggs.
